sentences.text: LETTER TO OUR SHAREHOLDERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 17, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to invite you to attend the Edison International and Southern California Edison Company Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held on Thursday, April 27, 2017, at 9:00 a.m., Pacific Time, at the Hilton Los Angeles/San Gabriel Hotel, 225 West Valley Blvd., San Gabriel, California 91776.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Proxy Statement includes information about our corporate governance and executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, we would like to direct your attention to the following matters discussed in the Proxy Statement:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The key qualifications, experience and diversity of our director nominees (pages 17);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our key corporate governance attributes (page 2);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our leadership transition and separation of the Chair and Chief Executive Officer roles (pages 2 and 9)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board oversight of cybersecurity and environmental and social issues (page 10); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our engagement with major shareholders on our corporate governance, executive compensation and business strategy (pages 2 and 27).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your Vote is Important
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy materials are being mailed or provided to you via the Internet beginning on March 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We hope that you will participate in the Annual Meeting by attending and/or voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote your proxy via the Internet, by telephone, or by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please follow the instructions on the Notice of Internet Availability of proxy materials or Proxy Card that you received in the mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you receive more than one copy of the Notice or more than one Proxy Card, it means your shares are held in more than one account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You should vote the shares in all of your accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note that to vote your shares by Internet or telephone you will need the control number on your Notice or Proxy Card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is very important to us and to our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by Internet or telephone, please cast your vote by the April 26 deadline (April 25 for shares held in the Edison 401(k) Savings Plan).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you very much for your continued interest in our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: William P. Sullivan Chair of the Board

sentences.text: Pedro J. Pizarro

sentences.text: Our Business, Strategy, and Financial Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EIXs core business is conducted by its subsidiary SCE, a rate-regulated electric utility that supplies electric energy to approximately 15 million people in a 50,000 square-mile area of southern California.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our mission is to safely provide customers reliable, affordable and clean electricity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our strategy has three key elements:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Invest in our infrastructure to maintain a safe and reliable transmission and distribution network.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Modernize the electric grid to enable increased penetration of distributed energy resources to support Californias climate change and greenhouse gas reduction objectives and empower our customers to make new energy technology choices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Promote operational and service excellence to enhance performance in the areas of safety, reliability, customer satisfaction, and cost.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This strategy is intended to provide a foundation for long-term sustainable growth and shareholder valu
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Significant results for EIX include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 consolidated core earnings of $3.97 per share exceeded our goal of $3.91 per share;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One-year (2016) total shareholder return (TSR) of 24.9% exceeded the Philadelphia Utility Index, which had a TSR of 17.4%;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Three-year (2014-2016) TSR of 68.6% exceeded the Philadelphia Utility Index TSR of 41.9%;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Five-year (2012-2016) TSR of 99.8% exceeded the Philadelphia Utility Index TSR of 56.6%; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual dividend rate has grown from $1.30 per share in 2012 to $2.17 per share in 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Leadership Transition
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Theodore F. Craver, Jr. retired at age 65 from his position as EIX Chairman and Chief Executive Officer (CEO), effective September 30, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In anticipation of Mr. Cravers retirement, the Board established a special committee on Board leadership and regularly discussed succession planning at Board meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the succession planning process, the EIX Board determined that separating the roles of the chair and CEO upon Mr. Cravers retirement would be in the best interests of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective upon Mr. Cravers retirement, the Board appointed independent director William P. Sullivan as the non- executive Chair of the EIX Board and elected Pedro J. Pizarro to succeed Mr. Craver as EIX CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To facilitate this leadership transition, effective June 1, 2016, the Board elected Mr. Pizarro as EIX President and Kevin M. Payne as SCE CEO, succeeding Mr. Pizarro.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Shareholder Engagement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We seek and value input from our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we engaged with our major institutional shareholders to discuss the Companys corporate governance, executive compensation, and business strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, we sought feedback from shareholders regarding our proxy access framework and sustainability disclosure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management shared the feedback received from these discussions with the Board and relevant Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors Jagjeet S. Bindra, who decided not to stand for re-election, and Richard T. Schlosberg III, who reached the mandatory retirement age of 72, will leave the Board effective as of the date of the Annual Meeting.

sentences.text: Mr. Pizarro has been the President and CEO of EIX since October 2016.

sentences.text: Mr. Pizarro has held a wide range of executive positions at the EIX companies since joining EIX in 1999.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2011 through March 2014, he served as President of EME, an indirect subsidiary of EIX that filed for bankruptcy in 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that, Mr. Pizarro served as Executive Vice President of SCE from 2008 to 2011, responsible for SCEs transmission and distribution system, procurement of conventional and renewable power, and gas-fired and hydroelectric power production facilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also previously served as Vice President and Senior Vice President of Power Procurement, and Vice President of Strategy and Business Development, among other executive roles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to his work at the EIX companies, Mr. Pizarro was a senior engagement manager with McKinsey & Company, providing management consulting services to energy, technology, engineering services, and banking clients.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is a director of the Edison Electric Institute and the Electric Power Research Institute, and is a member of the Board of Governors of Argonne National Laboratory.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Pizarro is a graduate of Harvard University and earned a Ph.D. in chemistry from the California Institute of Technology.

sentences.text: ITEM 1: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are potential director nominees identified and selected by the Board to become nominees?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee, comprised solely of independent directors under New York Stock Exchange LLC (NYSE) rules and our Corporate Governance Guidelines, recommends director candidates to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee will consider candidates recommended by shareholders if they are submitted in writing to the Corporate Secretary and include all of the information required by Article II, Section 4 of our Bylaws plus a written description with any supporting materials of:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any direct or indirect business relationships or transactions within the last three years between EIX and its subsidiaries and senior management, on the one hand, and the candidate and his or her affiliates and immediate family members, on the other hand; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The qualifications, qualities, and skills of the candidate that the shareholder deems appropriate to submit to the Committee to assist in its consideration of the candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also considers candidates recommended by our directors, senior management, and director search firms retained by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hernandez, who was elected to the Board in August 2016 and is a first-time nominee for election by the shareholders at the Annual Meeting, was recommended by the Committees director search firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The search firm supports the process of identifying director candidates, coordinating the interview process and conducting reference checks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no differences in the manner in which the Committee evaluates a candidate based on the source of the recommendation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If, based on an evaluation of the candidates qualifications, qualities and skills, the Committee determines to continue its consideration of a candidate, Committee members and other directors as determined by the Committee interview the candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee conducts any further research on the candidate it deems appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee then determines whether to recommend that the candidate be nominated as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considers the recommendation and determines whether to nominate the candidate for election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What information does the Governance Committee consider when recommending a director nominee?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the Committee to recommend a director nominee, the candidate must at a minimum possess the qualifications, qualities and skills in our Corporate Governance Guidelines, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A reputation for integrity, honesty and adherence to high ethical standards;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Experience in a generally recognized position of leadership; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The demonstrated business acumen, experience and ability to exercise sound judgment in matters that relate to the current and long-term objectives of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also considers other factors and information, including the Boards current need for additional members, the candidates potential for increasing the Boards range of experience, skills and diversity, the candidates independence, and skills and experience relevant to our business strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In nominating candidates for re-election to the Board, the Committee also considers the nature and time invested in a directors service on other boards, the directors Board, Board committee and annual meeting attendance, and the vote received at the prior annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does the Governance Committee consider diversity in identifying director candidates?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines state the Boards policy that the value of diversity on the Board should be considered.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee considers ethnic and gender diversity, and diversity of skills, backgrounds and qualifications represented on the Board, in recommending nominees for election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee has instructed its director search firm to identify candidates reflecting ethnic and gender diversity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee evaluates its effectiveness in achieving diversity on the Board through its annual review of Board composition, which identifies ethnicity, gender and industry experience prior to recommending nominees for election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does the Board determine which directors are independent?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines require that the Board be comprised of at least a majority of independent directors and that the Audit, Compensation, and Governance Committees be comprised entirely of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company uses the NYSE listing standards to determine independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors serving on the Audit and the Compensation Committees must meet additional independence criteria prescribed by the NYSE listing standards and the charters of those Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Chang serves on the audit committees of the American Funds family, Sykes Enterprises, Incorporated and Transocean Ltd.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined Ms. Changs simultaneous service on the audit committees of three other public companies does not impair her ability to effectively serve on our Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that the relationships described in Section B of Exhibit A-1 to our Corporate Governance Guidelines, which are on our website at www.edison.com/corpgov, are not material for purposes of determining directors independence to serve on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board does not consider these relationships in making independence determinations to serve on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For relationships not prohibited by NYSE rules and not covered under the categories of immaterial relationships in our Guidelines, the determination of whether a relationship is material or not, and therefore whether a director is independent to serve on the Board or not, is made in good faith by the directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The director whose relationship is under consideration abstains from the vote regarding his or her independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Which directors has the Board determined are independent to serve on the Board?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that all directors other than Messrs. Pizarro and Payne are independent to serve on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board reviews the independence of our directors to serve on the Board or an independent Board committee at least annually, and periodically as needed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On a monthly basis, the Company also monitors director relationships and transactions that might disqualify them as independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2017, prior to recommending director nominees for election, the Board confirmed that the independent directors had no relationships or transactions that disqualified them as independent to serve on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is the Chair of the Board and what are the Chairs duties and responsibilities?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Sullivan has served as the independent Chair of the EIX Board since September 30, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to this time, Mr. Craver served as EIX Chairman and CEO and Mr. White served as the Companys Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective upon Mr. Cravers retirement on September 30, 2016, the EIX Board separated the roles of Chair and CEO by amending the EIX Bylaws and Corporate Governance Guidelines and appointing Mr. Sullivan as independent Chair of the EIX Board and Mr. Pizarro as EIX CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company no longer has a Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As independent Chair, Mr. Sullivans duties include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Chair the Board meetings and Annual Meetings;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With the CEO, create the agenda for the Board meetings;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With the Governance Committee, oversee the annual evaluations of the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Be the principal liaison in synthesizing and communicating to the CEO key issues from the executive sessions of the independent directors; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With the Compensation Committee Chair, conduct the annual CEO performance review after review with the independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SCE Bylaws provide that the CEO of SCE has the duties of the Chair unless a separate Chair of the SCE Board is appointed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since June 1, 2016, Mr. Payne has served as SCE CEO and has had the duties of the Chair of the SCE Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SCE does not have a Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why does the Board believe its Board leadership structure is appropriate?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EIX Board believes separating the Chair and CEO positions is the most appropriate leadership structure for EIX at this time, by allowing Mr. Pizarro to focus on the day-to-day management of the business and on executing our strategic priorities, while allowing Mr. Sullivan to focus on leading the Board, providing advice and counsel to Mr. Pizarro, and facilitating the Boards independent oversight of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SCE Board has determined that the current leadership structure is appropriate for SCE as a subsidiary of EIX.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All directors of SCE are independent, except for Messrs. Payne and Pizarro, and the key Board committees are composed entirely of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the Boards role in CEO succession planning?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes CEO succession planning is one of its most important responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines provide that the Board will annually review and evaluate succession planning and management development for the Companys senior officers, including the CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At least annually, the Board meets in executive session with the EIX CEO to discuss talent and succession planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The discussion includes CEO succession in the ordinary course, CEO succession if an emergency occurs, and succession for other key senior management positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The frequency of the Boards CEO succession planning discussions depends in part on the period until the CEOs expected retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the succession planning process, internal CEO succession candidates are identified and evaluated based on criteria considered predictive of success at the CEO level, considering the Companys business strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board uses a common talent assessment format for each individual.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The assessment includes a development plan for each individual.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines provide that the Board will have opportunities to become acquainted with the senior officers of the Company and others who may have the potential to handle significant management positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is carried out through opportunities for officers to make presentations to the Board and Board committees, director education sessions, other business interactions, and social events intended for this purpose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the Boards role in risk oversight?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines provide that one of the Boards primary functions is to review the Companys enterprise risk management process and monitor strategic and emerging risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board reviews key enterprise risks identified by management, such as financial, reputational, safety, physical and cyber security, and compliance risks, and monitors key risks through reports and discussions regarding key risk areas at Board meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also focuses on specific strategic and emerging risks in periodic strategy reviews.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board annually reviews corporate goals and approves capital budgets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board committees have responsibility for risk oversight in specific areas as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for oversight of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) risk assessment and risk management policies,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) major financial risk exposures, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the steps management has taken to monitor and control these exposures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee reviews the Companys risk management processes and key enterprise risks, reviews the EIX risk management committee charter, receives regular reports on litigation, internal audits and compliance, receives deep dive reports on specific risk topics at meetings, and receives semi-annual reports of the Companys political contributions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also annually reviews and approves the internal audit plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EIX Vice President of Enterprise Risk Management regularly attends Committee meetings and reports on risk issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ITEM 1: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee assesses and monitors risks in the Companys compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees risk assessment process and factors considered in assessing risk are discussed under How We Make Compensation Decisions - Risk Considerations in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The FOSO Committee is responsible for oversight of risks in the Companys capital investment activities and operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee regularly monitors the level of capital spending relative to approved capital budgets and must approve significant capital spending variances and projects not included in approved capital budgets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also monitors safety and operational performance metrics, significant developments related to safety, physical and cyber security, reliability and affordability, and the availability of resources in these areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee receives deep dive reports on key topics related to its responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee advises the Board regarding Board size and composition, Board committee composition and responsibilities, selection of the independent Chair of the EIX Board, and corporate governance practices that help position the Board to effectively carry out its risk oversight responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes its leadership structure supports the Boards risk oversight function.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent directors chair the Board committees responsible for risk oversight, the Company has an independent Chair of the EIX Board who facilitates communication between management and directors, and all directors are involved in the review of key enterprise risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the Boards role in cybersecurity oversight?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has identified cybersecurity as a key enterprise risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cyber risks are included in the key risk reports to the Audit Committee discussed above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board has assigned primary responsibility for cybersecurity oversight to the FOSO Committee, which receives cybersecurity updates with each meeting that focus on the Companys most critical assets, cybersecurity drills, exercises, mitigation of cyber risks, and assessments by third-party experts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Board also received a report with a similar focus on reducing the Companys cybersecurity risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has established a cybersecurity oversight group comprised of a multidisciplinary senior management team to provide governance and strategic direction for the identification, protection and detection of cybersecurity risks to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Tauscher serves as the Board liaison to the oversight group and regularly attends meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Board members attend at least one meeting annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the Boards role in oversight of environmental and social issues?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Environmental and social policies have a significant impact on the Companys business and strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, the Board is egularly engaged in oversight of environmental and social issues related to the Companys operations, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Environmental legislation and regulation related to renewable energy, distributed generation, energy efficiency and climate change;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strategic decisions and opportunities related to public policy focus on sustainability;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employee and supplier diversity; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employee, contractor and public safety.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board oversees environmental and social issues that impact the Companys business, regulatory requirements, and reputation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risks associated with environmental and social issues are identified in key risk reports to the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also oversees the Companys political and charitable contributions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do the Board and Board committees evaluate their performance?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and Board committees complete an annual self-evaluation questionnaire and discuss the results of their evaluation in executive session during the applicable Board or committee meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors have the opportunity to provide feedback on the performance of other directors during this process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee oversees the annual evaluation of the Board and Board committees and periodically reviews the effectiveness of the process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many times did the Board meet in 2016?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board met eleven times in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director attended 75% or more of all Board and Board committee meetings he or she was eligible to attend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board held six executive sessions of the independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Does the Company have a policy on attendance of Director nominees at Annual Meetings?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director nominees are expected to attend Annual Meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the EIX and SCE directors except Mr. Taylor attended the 2016 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Are directors required to hold EIX Common Stock?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Within five years from their initial election to the Board, directors must own an aggregate number of shares of EIX Common Stock or derivative securities convertible into EIX Common Stock, excluding stock options, having a value equivalent to five times the annual Board retainer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All deferred stock units held by a director count toward this ownership requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All directors comply with this stock ownership requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Has EIX adopted proxy access for director elections?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2015, the EIX Board adopted proxy access for director elections at annual meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EIX Bylaws provide that the Company will include in its Proxy Statement up to two nominees (or nominees for up to 20% of the EIX Board, whichever is greater) submitted by a shareholder or group of up to 20 shareholders owning at least 3% of EIX common stock continuously for at least three years, if the shareholder group and nominee satisfy the requirements in Article II, Section 13 of the EIX Bylaws, which are available at www.edison.com/corpgov.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EIX Board made this decision after careful consideration of feedback received from our engagement with shareholders regarding proxy access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Does EIX have a policy on shareholder rights plans?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EIX Board has a policy to seek prior shareholder approval of the adoption of any shareholder rights plan unless, due to time constraints or other reasons consistent with the EIX Boards fiduciary duties, a committee consisting solely of independent directors determines that it would be in the best interests of EIX shareholders to adopt the plan prior to shareholder approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any rights plan adopted by the EIX Board without prior shareholder approval will automatically terminate one year after adoption of the plan unless the plan is approved by EIX shareholders prior to such termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is SCE subject to the same corporate governance stock exchange rules as EIX?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EIX is subject to NYSE rules and SCE is subject to NYSE MKT LLC rules, which exempt SCE from designated corporate governance rules for Board and Board committee composition, including director independence, the director nominations process, and the process to determine executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SCE is exempt from these rules because
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) it is a controlled company with over 50% of the voting power held by its parent company, EIX, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) it has listed only preferred stock on the exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, SCE closely follows the EIX corporate governance practices required under the NYSE rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How may I communicate with the Board?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders and other interested parties may communicate with the Board or individual directors by following the procedures on our website at www.edison.com/corpgov.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where can I find the Companys corporate governance documents?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EIX Bylaws, Corporate Governance Guidelines, and Board committee charters, the Ethics and Compliance Code for Directors applicable to all directors of EIX and SCE, and the Employee Code of Conduct applicable to all EIX and SCE officers and employees, are on our website at www.edison.com/corpgov.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SCE Bylaws, Corporate Governance Guidelines and Board committee charters are on our website at www.sce.com/corpgov.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain Relationships and Related Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee reviews at least annually, and periodically as needed, any transaction in the prior calendar year or any proposed transaction between the EIX companies and a related person in which the amount involved exceeds $120,000 and the related person has a material interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A related person is a director, a director nominee, an executive officer, or a greater than 5% beneficial owner of any class of voting securities of EIX or SCE, and their immediate family members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This policy is stated in writing in the Committees charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees regular procedure is to obtain from management annually, and periodically as needed, a list of the transactions with related persons described above, and to review these transactions at a meeting held before recommending director nominations to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The list is based on information from questionnaires completed by our directors, director nominees, and executive officers, together with information obtained from our accounts payable and receivable records, and is reviewed by legal counsel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees procedure is evidenced in the minutes and records for the Committee meeting at which the review occurred.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

(SD&S), which paid the Company approximately $201,777 in 2016 to sublease office space in Washington, D.C. The Companys sublease of office space to SD&S began before Ms. Stuntz joined the Board.

sentences.text: Annual Equity Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon initial election or re-election to the Board, non-employee directors are granted an annual equity award of EIX Common Stock or deferred stock units (as explained below) with an aggregate grant date value of $135,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon initial appointment or re- appointment of a non-employee director as Chair of the EIX Board, the director is granted an additional annual equity award of EIX Common Stock or deferred stock units with an aggregate grant date value of $62,500.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the grant date of an award for an initial election to the Board or initial appointment as Chair of the EIX Board occurs after the date of EIXs Annual Meeting for that year, then the grant date value of the award is prorated by multiplying it by the following percentage: 75% if the grant date is in the second quarter of the year; 50% if the grant date is in the third quarter of the year; 25% if the grant date is in the fourth quarter of the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of shares or units granted is determined by dividing the grant date value of the equity award ($135,000, $62,500, or a prorated portion thereof, as described above) by the closing price of EIX Common Stock on the grant date and rounding up to the next whole share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each award is fully vested when granted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual equity award for an initial election to the Board is made in the form of deferred stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For re-election awards and he additional equity award for appointment or re-appointment as Chair of the EIX Board, directors have the opportunity to elect in advance to receive such awards entirely in EIX Common Stock, entirely in deferred stock units, or in any combination of the two.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A deferred stock unit is a contractual right to receive one share of EIX Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred stock units are credited to the directors account under the EIX Director Deferred Compensation Plan described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred stock units cannot be voted or sold.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They accrue dividend equivalents on the ex-dividend date, if and when dividends are declared on EIX Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The accrued dividend equivalents are converted to additional deferred stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each directors equity award in 2016 was granted under the EIX 2007 Performance Incentive Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors serving on both Company Boards receive only one award per year for election to the Boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In April 2016, EIX shareholders approved amendments to the EIX 2007 Performance Incentive Plan, including a limit of $500,000 per calendar year on the grant date fair value of awards to each non-employee director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, each non-employee director received equity awards totaling less than $200,000 in grant date fair value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EIX Director Deferred Compensation Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EIX Director Deferred Compensation Plan is separated into two plan documents.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The grandfathered plan document applies to deferrals earned prior to January 1, 2005, while the 2008 plan document applies to deferrals earned on or after January 1, 2005.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-employee directors are eligible to defer up to 100% of their retainers and meeting fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any portion of a directors annual equity award that he or she elects to receive as deferred stock units is automatically deferred.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amounts deferred (other than
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: deferred stock units) accrue interest until paid to the director at a rate equal to the average monthly Moodys Corporate Bond Yield for Baa Public Utility Bonds over a 60-month period ending September 1 of the prior year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amounts deferred under the grandfathered plan document (other than deferred stock units) may be deferred until a specified date, retirement, death or discontinuance of service as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the directors election, any such compensation deferred until retirement or death may be paid as a lump sum, in monthly installments over 60, 120, or 180 months, or in a combination of a partial lump sum and installments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any such deferred compensation is paid as a single lump sum or in three annual installments upon any other discontinuance of service as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors may elect at the time of deferral to receive payment on a fixed date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred amounts may also be paid in connection with a change in control of EIX or SCE in certain circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred stock units may be deferred until retirement, death or discontinuance of service as a director, and when payable will be distributed in EIX Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment will be made in a lump sum upon the directors retirement, unless a request to receive distribution in annual installments over 5, 10, or 15 years was previously approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discontinuance of service as a director prior to retirement will result in a lump sum payout of deferred stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the directors death, any remaining deferred stock unit balance will be paid to the directors beneficiary in a lump sum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred stock units may also be paid in connection with a change in control of EIX or SCE in certain circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment of 2008 Plan Benefits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any amounts deferred under the 2008 plan document (including deferred stock units) may be deferred until a specified date no later than the date the director turns age 75, retirement, death, disability or other separation from service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors have sub- accounts for each annual deferral for which the following forms of payment may be elected:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Single lump-sum;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Two to fifteen annual installments;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Monthly installments for 60 to 180 months; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any combination of the above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payments triggered by retirement, death, disability or other separation from service may begin upon the applicable triggering event or a specified number of months and/or years following the applicable triggering event.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, payments may not begin later than the directors 75th birthday unless the director is still on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payments are subject to certain administrative earliest payment date rules, and may be delayed or accelerated under the 2008 plan document if permitted or required under Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a director who was eligible to participate in the plan by December 31, 2008 dies within ten years of his or her initial eligibility to participate in the plan, the directors remaining deferred compensation account balance will be doubled and paid to his or her beneficiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, deferred stock units and any amounts attributable to dividend equivalents previously associated with stock options will not be doubled.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All amounts payable are treated as obligations of EIX.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Determination of Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board makes all decisions regarding director compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These decisions are normally made after receiving recommendations from the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee makes its recommendations after receiving input from its independent compensation consultant and management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee retained Pay Governance LLC (Pay Governance) to evaluate and make recommendations regarding director compensation for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay Governances assistance included helping the Compensation Committee identify industry trends and norms for director compensation, reviewing and identifying peer group companies, and evaluating director compensation data for these companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The changes made to director compensation in 2016, including the additional cash retainer and equity award for the Chair of the EIX Board, were based on analysis and recommendations provided by Pay Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Managements input focuses on legal, compliance, and administrative issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ITEM 2: RATIFICATION OF THE APPOINTMENT OF THE INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of the Independent Auditor retained to audit the Companys financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has selected PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC) as the Companys Independent Auditor for calendar year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company is asking shareholders to ratify this appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwC is an international accounting firm which provides leadership in public utility accounting matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of PwC are expected to attend the Annual Meeting to respond to appropriate questions and to make a statement if they wish.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwC has been retained as the Companys Independent Auditor continuously since 2002.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has adopted restrictions on hiring certain persons formerly associated with PwC into an accounting or financial reporting oversight role to help ensure PwCs continuing independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee meets annually in executive session without PwC present to evaluate the quality of PwCs audit services and their performance, including PwCs industry knowledge from an accounting and tax perspective, PwCs continued independence and professional skepticism, the Committees discussions with management about PwCs performance, and information available from Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) inspection reports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee annually considers whether the Independent Auditor firm should be reappointed for another year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The lead engagement partner is required to rotate off the Companys audit every five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is involved in the selection of the lead engagement partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2015, in connection with the mandated rotation of PwCs lead engagement partner effective beginning with PwCs audit of the Companys 2016 financial statements, the Company interviewed candidates who met professional, industry and personal criteria, and selected finalists.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee Chair participated in interviews with the finalists and selected the lead engagement partner, in consultation with the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee considered several factors when determining whether to reappoint PwC as the Companys Independent Auditor, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The length of time PwC has been engaged;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwCs knowledge of the Company and its personnel, processes, accounting systems and risk profile;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The quality of the Audit Committees ongoing discussions with PwC, their independence and professional skepticism; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An assessment of the professional qualifications, utility industry experience and past performance of PwC, its lead engagement partner, and other members of the core engagement team.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee and the Board believe that the continued retention of PwC to serve as the Companys Independent Auditor is in the best interests of the Company and its investors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company is not required to submit this appointment to a shareholder vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification would be advisory only.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if the shareholders of either EIX or SCE do not ratify the appointment, the Audit Committee will investigate the reasons for rejection by the shareholders and will reconsider the appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends you vote FOR Item 2.

sentences.text: The following table sets forth the aggregate fees billed by PwC to EIX (consolidated total including EIX and its subsidiaries) and SCE, respectively, for the fiscal years ended December 31, 2016 and December 31, 2015:

sentences.text: (1) These represent fees for professional services provided in connection with the audit of the Companys annual financial statements and internal controls over financial reporting, and reviews of the Companys quarterly financial statements.

sentences.text: ITEM 3: ADVISORY VOTE TO APPROVE THE COMPANYS EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The advisory vote to approve the Companys executive compensation, commonly known as Say-on-Pay, gives shareholders the opportunity to endorse or not endorse our executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This advisory vote is required by SEC rules to be provided at least once every three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, in 2011, our shareholders voted in favor of holding the advisory vote every year, and the Board determined that it would be held annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys Say-on-Pay proposal received support from at least 91% of the votes cast in each of the last six years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program is described under Compensation Discussion and Analysis below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage you to read it carefully.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program is reviewed and approved by the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes our executive compensation structure is competitive, aligns compensation with shareholder value and serves shareholders well.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EIX and SCE request shareholder approval of the compensation paid to the Companys named executive officers, as disclosed in this Proxy Statement under the SECs compensation disclosure rules, including the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, the compensation tables and the narrative discussion that accompanies the compensation tables.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company values constructive dialogue with shareholders on compensation and other important governance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because your vote is advisory, it will not be binding on the Board or the Company and will not be construed as overruling a decision by the Board or the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Compensation Committee will consider the outcome of the vote and any constructive feedback from shareholders when making future executive compensation decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Compensation Summary  Shareholder Communication and Compensation Program for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is expected that the next Say-on-Pay vote will occur at the 2018 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends you vote FOR Item 3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ITEM 4: ADVISORY VOTE ON THE FREQUENCY OF SAY-ON-PAY VOTES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Item 3 above provides our shareholders the opportunity to cast an advisory Say-on-Pay vote to endorse or not endorse the compensation of our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2011, our shareholders voted in favor of holding the Say-on-Pay vote every year, and the Board determined that it would be held annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board continues to believe that Say-on-Pay votes should be conducted every year so that shareholders may annually express their views on the Companys executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SEC rules require that at least every six years the Company provide our shareholders the opportunity to cast an advisory vote on how often we should include a Say-on-Pay proposal in our proxy materials for future shareholder meetings at which directors will be elected and for which we must include executive compensation information in the proxy statement for that meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this Item 4, shareholders are given the choice in the proxy card to vote to have the Say-on-Pay vote every year, every two years or every three years, or abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, shareholders will not be voting to approve or disapprove the Boards specific recommendation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Like the Say-on-Pay vote, your vote on this Item 4 is advisory and will not be binding upon the Board or the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board and its Compensation Committee value the opinions expressed by shareholders and will take into account the outcome of the vote when considering the frequency of future Say-on-Pay votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends you vote to hold the Say-on-Pay vote every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: COMPENSATION DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Compensation Discussion and Analysis (CD&A) describes the principles of our executive compensation program, how we applied those principles in compensating our named executive officers (NEOs) for 2016, and how we use our compensation program to drive performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also discuss the roles and responsibilities of our Compensation Committee (the Committee) in determining executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CD&A is organized as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What We Pay and Why: Elements of Total Direct Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How We Make Compensation Decisions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Post-Employment and Other Benefits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Compensation Policies and Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CD&A contains information relevant to your decision regarding the advisory vote to approve our executive compensation (Item 3 on your Proxy Card).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When voting on Item 3, EIX shareholders will vote on EIX executive compensation, while SCE shareholders will vote on SCE executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain key information about our executive compensation program is highlighted in this Compensation Summary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Practices
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program is designed with the objective of strongly linking pay with performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The table below highlights our current compensation practices for NEOs, including practices we believe drive performance and are aligned with good governance principles, and practices we have not implemented because we do not believe they would serve our shareholders long-term interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What We Do        What We Dont Do  We tie pay to performance by making the majority of compensation at risk and linking it to shareholders interests  We do not have any employment contracts  We target a competitive range around the market median for base salary and annual and long-term incentives  We do not provide excise tax gross-ups on change in control payments  We compare executive compensation to a peer group defined by a recognized market index  We do not have individually negotiated change in control agreements  We balance multiple metrics for annual and long-term incentives  We do not provide perquisites  We have double-trigger change in control provisions for equity award vesting  We do not provide personal use of any corporate aircraft  We seek shareholder feedback on our executive compensation program and share the feedback with the Board and the Committee  We do not reprice or allow the cash buyout of stock options with exercise prices below the current market value of EIX Common Stock  We have stock ownership guidelines, which include holding requirements, and an incentive compensation clawback policy  We do not permit pledging of Company securities by directors or EIX executive officers  Our Committees compensation consultant is independent and does not provide any other services to the Company  We do not permit hedging of Company securities by directors or employees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Communication and Compensation Program for 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We seek and value input from our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we engaged with our major institutional shareholders to discuss the Companys corporate governance, executive compensation, and business strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management shared the feedback received from these discussions with the Board and relevant Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EIXs Say-on-Pay proposal received support from approximately 96% of the votes cast in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee reviewed the results of the shareholder vote, including feedback from major shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Taking the vote results and shareholder feedback into account, and considering trends in executive compensation and the best interests of shareholders, the Committee approved maintaining our executive compensation program with the following changes for 2017: the previously-approved termination of the Executive Survivor Benefit Plan went into effect; and the Companys stock ownership guidelines were amended February 22, 2017 to implement holding restrictions for EIX common stock acquired pursuant to long-term incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: More information is under Potential Payments Upon Termination or Change in Control  Executive Survivor Benefit Plan and Other Compensation Policies and Guidelines  Stock Ownership Guidelines.

sentences.text: What We Pay and Why: Elements of Total Direct Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We generally target a competitive range of +/-15% around the market median for each element of total direct compensation offered under our program: base salaries, annual cash incentives, and long-term equity-based incentives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The reasons for the Committees decision to target the competitive range around the median level include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy of the applicable regulatory authorities that SCE should provide market level compensation, and the desire for
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: internal compensation equity between EIX and SCE;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Above-median compensation usually is not needed, except occasionally for recruitment and retention purposes and to reward exceptional performers; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) Core earnings is defined on a consolidated basis for EIX as earnings attributable to EIX shareholders less non-core items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-core items include income or loss from discontinued operations, income resulting from allocation of losses to tax equity investor under the HLBV accounting method and income or loss from significant discrete items that management does not consider representative of ongoing earnings, such as: exit activities, including sale of certain assets and other activities that are no longer continuing, write downs, asset impairments and other gains or losses related to certain tax, regulatory or legal settlements or proceedings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For a reconciliation of core earnings to net income determined under GAAP, see Managements Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations  Management Overview  Highlights of Operating Results included as part of the Companys 2016 Annual Report.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This pay mix provides an opportunity for NEO compensation to reflect the upside and downside potential of company performance and helps to focus NEOs attention on our financial, strategic and operating objectives, and shareholder returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base Salary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, each NEOs base salary was evaluated according to his or her position and performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each position, a market base salary range was determined.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The median of the range was the market median level of base salaries for comparable positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not have employment contracts and our NEOs do not have contractual rights to receive fixed base salaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with the leadership transition during 2016, the Committee increased the annual base salary rates of Messrs. Pizarro, Payne, Petmecky, and Nichols and Ms. Rigatti.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After their respective final promotions for 2016, these NEOs annual base salary rates were approximately 10-40% below the market median for their respective new positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each NEO has an opportunity for an increase in his or her annual base salary rate in 2017 after the NEOs performance in the new position is evaluated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in early 2016, the Committee increased the base salary rates of Messrs. Scilacci and Umanoff and set them within 1% of the market median for their respective positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Incentive Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Incentive Compensation Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NEOs are eligible for annual incentive awards under the EIX Executive Incentive Compensation Plan for achieving financial,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: strategic and operational goals that are established at the beginning of each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The goals are tied to the key elements of our strategy described on page 1 and specific quantitative targets are set for most of the goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2016 annual incentive award target value for each NEO was set as a percentage of the NEOs base salary (the Annual Incentive Target %).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with the leadership transition during 2016, the Committee increased the Annual Incentive Target % for Messrs. Pizarro, Payne, Petmecky, and Nichols and Ms. Rigatti, and set the respective Annual Incentive Target % within ten percentage points of the market median for the new positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in early 2016, the Committee increased the respective Annual Incentive Target % for Messrs. Craver, Scilacci, and Umanoff to bring it closer to or approximately at the market median for their respective positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The minimum annual incentive award is $0.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum award is 200% of target, which the Committees independent compensation consultant, Pay Governance, advised is the most prevalent practice among the peer group companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee determines annual incentive awards based on corporate and individual performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate performance factor is based on performance relative to the goals established at the beginning of the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each goal category, the Committee assigned a target score reflecting the relative weight given that goal category and a potential score range.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2017, the Committee determined the score achieved for each goal category, depending on the extent to which the goals were unmet, met or exceeded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Separate goals were established for EIX and SCE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, as reflected in the 2016 EIX Corporate Performance Scoring Matrix below, many of EIXs goals related to SCEs performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual incentive awards for Messrs. Craver, Scilacci, Litzinger, and Umanoff were based on the EIX corporate performance factor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual incentive awards for Messrs. Payne, Petmecky, Dietrich, Nichols, and Swartz were based on the SCE corporate performance factor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Pizarros and Ms. Rigattis annual incentive awards were based on a blend of the EIX and SCE corporate performance factors, weighted based upon the relative time each respectively served as an EIX officer and as an SCE officer in 2016.

sentences.text: Impact of Other Plans The EIX Committee adopted the EIX 2016 Executive Annual Incentive Program (162(m) Program) so that annual incentive awards under the EIX Executive Incentive Compensation Plan could be designed to qualify as deductible performance-based compensation under Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code (Section 162(m)).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the 162(m) Program, an overall maximum annual incentive award for 2016 was established for each participating officer as a specified percentage of an annual incentive award pool.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The aggregate award pool for the participating officers had a maximum value equal to 3% of EIXs 2016 consolidated earnings from continuing operations (after interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization), subject to adjustment for the effects of any special charges to earnings (the Section 162(m) Pool).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following percentages of the pool were allocated to the NEOs to determine maximum annual incentive awards for 2016: Mr. Pizarro, 11%; Mr. Craver, 28%; Ms. Rigatti, 4%; Mr. Scilacci, 10%; Mr. Umanoff, 8%; Mr. Payne, 3%; Mr. Litzinger, 8%; Mr. Nichols, 3%; Mr. Swartz, 4%; and Mr. Dietrich, 5% (each, an Individual Section 162(m) Cap).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neither the Section 162(m) Pool nor the Individual Section 162(m) Caps served as a basis for the Committees compensation decisions for NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, these caps served to establish a ceiling on annual incentive awards for purposes of tax deductions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the total amount awarded under the 162(m) Program was less than the Section 162(m) Pool and the actual annual incentive awarded to each participating NEO was less than his or her Individual Section 162(m) Cap.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
