sentences.text: MEETING AND VOTING INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is included in the proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy materials include the Proxy Statement (which includes a letter to shareholders and a Notice of Annual Meeting), the Annual Report, the Proxy Card, and the Notice of Internet Availability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did the Company mail a Notice of Internet Availability instead of a printed copy of the materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Providing the proxy materials to shareholders via the Internet saves us the cost of printing and mailing documents and reduces the impact of the Annual Meeting on the environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f you received only a Notice of Internet Availability, you will not receive a printed copy of the proxy materials unless you request hem.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice includes instructions on how to access and review the proxy materials, submit your proxy via the Internet, and request a printed copy of proxy materials by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did some shareholders receive printed or email copies of the proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are distributing printed copies of the proxy materials to shareholders who have previously requested printed copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are providing shareholders who have previously requested electronic delivery of proxy materials with an email containing a link to the website where the materials are available via the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who can vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All owners of voting stock at the close of business on March 3, 2017 (the record date) may vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On each Item of EIX business, holders of EIX Common Stock are entitled to one vote per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On each Item of SCE business, holders of SCE Cumulative Preferred Stock are entitled to six votes per share and EIX, as the holder of SCE Common Stock, is entitled to one vote per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shares of SCE Common and Cumulative Preferred Stock vote together as one class.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who can attend the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shareholders on the record date, or their duly appointed proxies, may attend the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shareholders will be required to pass through a security inspection area (where all packages will be subject to search) and check in at the registration desk at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The registration desk will open at 8:00 a.m. and meeting room doors will open at 8:30 a.m., Pacific Time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For your protection, purses, briefcases, backpacks, and packages may be subject to inspection.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may not bring signs, banners, handouts, or similar items into the meeting room.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Photography and video/audio recording of the Annual Meeting are not permitted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a Registered Shareholder or a 401(k) Plan Shareholder, we can verify your share ownership from the share register with proper identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No admission pass is required.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be admitted as a proxy for a Registered Shareholder, you must provide a written authorization from the Registered Shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f your shares are held in Street Name, you will need to bring proper identification and a letter or an account statement from your broker or other nominee reflecting your stock ownership as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be admitted as a proxy for a broker, you must provide a written authorization from the broker with a letter or account statement reflecting the brokers ownership as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a nominee holds the shares, you must provide a written authorization from the nominee to the broker that is assignable, a written authorization from the broker, and a letter or account statement reflecting the nominees ownership as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ndividual shareholders may bring one guest to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A shareholder that is a corporation, partnership, association or other entity is limited to three authorized representatives at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where is the Annual Meeting Located?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Hilton Los Angeles/San Gabriel Hotel is located just north of Interstate 10, approximately ten miles east of Downtown Los Angeles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From Interstate 10, take the Del Mar Ave. exit north (towards San Gabriel) to Valley Blvd.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Turn left at Valley Blvd. to 225 West Valley Blvd.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can save us the expense of additional solicitations by voting promptly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who received a Proxy Card by mail may vote via the Internet by following the instructions on the Proxy Card.

sentences.text: When voting via the Internet, all shareholders must have available the control number on their Notice of Internet Availability or Proxy Card.

sentences.text: Under California law, you may transmit a proxy via the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Telephone  Registered or 401(k) Plan Shareholders may vote by telephone by calling 1-866-883-3382 and following the recorded instructions.

sentences.text: What is the deadline to vote and how do I change my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a Registered Shareholder, the inspector of election will accept your proxy by telephone or via the Internet until 9:00 p.m., Pacific Time, on April 26, 2017, and by mail if it is received by the inspector of election before the polls close at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered Shareholders may change their vote prior to the deadline by writing to the Corporate Secretary at the address above (so it is received prior to the deadline), voting again by mail, telephone or the Internet, or voting in person at the Annual Meeting.

sentences.text: If you hold shares in Street Name, most brokers will accept your proxy by telephone or the Internet until 9:00 p.m., Pacific Time, on April 26, 2017, and by mail if it is received by your brokers designated agent by 9:00 a.m., Pacific Time, on April 27, 2017.

sentences.text: Contact your broker or other nominee before the Annual Meeting to determine the actual deadline and whether and how you can change your vote.

sentences.text: What does it mean if I get more than one Notice of Internet Availability or Proxy Card?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It indicates that your shares are held in more than one account, such as two brokerage accounts, or you hold both registered and Street Name shares, or you hold shares in both EIX and SCE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Use the control numbers provided on each Notice of Internet Availability or Proxy Card and vote each Notice or Proxy Card to ensure that all of your shares are voted.

sentences.text: This depends on how you hold your shares, and whether you hold shares in EIX, SCE, or both EIX and SCE.

sentences.text: Registered and 401(k) Plan Shareholders  For EIX registered and 401(k) Plan Shareholders, you will receive or have Internet access to a single Proxy Card that covers all shares of EIX Common Stock in your registered and 401(k) Plan accounts, including fractional shares held in the 401(k) Plan but excluding fractional shares held in the Dividend Reinvestment and Direct Stock Purchase Plan.

sentences.text: For SCE Registered Shareholders, you will receive or have Internet access to separate Proxy Cards for each series of preferred stock registered in your name.

sentences.text: If you hold registered shares in both EIX and SCE, you will receive or have Internet access to separate Proxy Cards for each Company.

sentences.text: Street Name Shareholders  If you hold shares of EIX and/or SCE in Street Name, you will receive or have Internet access to separate Proxy Cards from each broker or other nominee.

sentences.text: The proxies and 401(k) Plan trustee will vote FOR election of all nominees for director (Item 1), FOR ratification of the appointment of the independent registered public accounting firm (Item 2), FOR approval of executive compensation (Item 3), to hold the advisory vote on the frequency of Say-on-Pay votes every year (Item 4), and AGAINST the shareholder proposal regarding shareholder proxy access reform (Item 5, EIX only).

sentences.text: MEETING AND VOTING INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock outstanding and entitled to cast 28,801,188 votes, and 434,888,104 shares of Common Stock outstanding and entitled to cast 434,888,104 votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting together as a class, the SCE shareholders may cast 463,689,292 votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, a quorum for SCE is 231,844,647 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What vote is required to adopt each Item at the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may vote for, against or abstain with respect to each proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director nominee will be elected and a proposal will be approved if the following votes are obtained:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of at least a majority of the votes cast on the director or proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not treated as votes cast, and therefore will not affect the vote; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of at least a majority of the votes required to constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not treated as votes cast and therefore will have the effect of votes cast against the director or proposal for these votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who will count the votes?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Wells Fargo Bank, N.A., will tabulate the votes and is expected to act as the inspector of election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To protect the confidentiality of votes cast under the 401(k) Plan, 401(k) Plan Shareholders voting instructions are given directly to Wells Fargo.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Wells Fargo will tabulate those votes and provide aggregate voting results directly to the 401(k) Plan trustee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EIX will not have access to any of the 401(k) Plan Shareholders voting instructions, and 401(k) Plan voting results are only reported to EIX in the aggregate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How much will this proxy solicitation cost?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have retained D.F. King & Co., Inc. to assist us with the solicitation of proxies and will pay an aggregate fee of $22,500 (EIX $20,000 and SCE $2,500) plus expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This fee does not include the costs of printing and mailing the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some of the directors, officers and other employees of the Company also may solicit proxies personally, by mail, by telephone or by other electronic means for no additional compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will also reimburse brokers and other nominees for their reasonable out-of- pocket and other actual expenses for forwarding proxy materials to beneficial owners and obtaining voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whom may I call with questions about the meeting or voting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may call Wells Fargo at 1-800-347-8625 or visit their Internet website at www.shareowneronline.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What happens if additional matters are presented at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is not aware of, and does not intend to present, any business to be acted upon at the Annual Meeting other than the Items described in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you submit a proxy and any other matters properly come before the Annual Meeting, including matters incident to the conduct of the Annual Meeting, the persons named as proxy holders will have the discretionary authority to vote your shares under their best judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any of the nominees for election to the Board become unavailable to stand for election as a director, the proxies will also have the authority to vote for substitute nominees chosen by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the deadline to submit shareholder proposals or other business for the 2017 Annual Meet
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The deadline to submit shareholder proposals for the Companys 2017 Annual Meeting was November 18, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be considered for inclusion in the 2018 Proxy Statement, shareholder proposals for the Companys 2018 Annual Meeting must be received by November 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders intending to bring any other business before an Annual Meeting, including director nominations, must give written notice to the Corporate Secretary of the business to be presented.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice must be received at our office within the periods, and with the information and documents, specified in the Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming that the 2018 Annual Meeting is held on April 26, 2018, as specified by the Bylaws, and does not change by more than 30 days earlier or later, the period for the receipt by the Corporate Secretary of written notice of other business to be brought by shareholders before the 2018 Annual Meeting, including director nominations presented for inclusion in the 2018 Proxy Statement or otherwise, will begin on September 18, 2017 and end on November 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 401(k) Plan        The employee benefit plan known as the Edison 401(k) Savings Plan through which participants may hold interests in EIX shares through the EIX Stock Fund 401(k) Plan Shareholders Participants in the 401(k) Plan who hold interests in EIX shares through the EIX Stock Fund Annual Meeting The EIX and SCE annual meetings of shareholders, which are held jointly Annual Report The EIX and SCE 2016 combined annual report on Form 10-K, which is prepared and filed with the SEC jointly Board Both the EIX and SCE Boards of Directors, unless otherwise indicated Committee The applicable Board committees of both EIX and SCE, unless otherwise indicated Company Both EIX and SCE, unless otherwise indicated Compensation Committee The Compensation and Executive Personnel Committees of both EIX and SCE, unless otherwise indicated Edison Energy Group or EEG Edison Energy Group, Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of EIX and the holding company for EIXs competitive businesses in emerging sectors of the electric industry EIX Edison International EME Edison Mission Energy, an indirect wholly-owned subsidiary of EIX  EME was an independent power producer that filed for bankruptcy in 2012  In April 2014, substantially all of EMEs assets and liabilities were discharged in bankruptcy or transferred to third parties ERISA The Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 FOSO Committee The Finance, Operations and Safety Oversight Committees of both EIX and SCE, unless otherwise indicated Governance Committee The Nominating/Corporate Governance Committees of both EIX and SCE, unless otherwise indicated Notice of Internet Availability, or Notice The notice regarding the availability on the Internet of the Companys proxy materials, which was mailed to most shareholders in lieu of printed copies of the proxy materials, as permitted under SEC rules Proxy Card Either a proxy card, which you may receive if you are a Registered Shareholder, or a voting instruction form, which you may receive if you hold shares in Street Name or are a 401(k) Plan Shareholder Proxy Statement The EIX and SCE proxy statements, which are prepared and filed with the SEC jointly Registered Shareholder Your shares are registered in your own name on the Companys records Shares held in your Dividend Reinvestment and Direct Stock Purchase Plan account are included SCE Southern California Edison Company Street Name Your shares are held in a brokerage account or through a trustee, custodian or other third party (referred to as a nominee), and you are the beneficial owner of those shares Your name does not appear on the Companys records as a shareholder

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Distributing these proxy materials via the Internet saves us the cost of printing, mailing and storing documents, and reduces the impact of the Annual Meeting on the environment.
